title: Get Candidates

Parameter.description:
Fields to embed on the response. Available fields: sentiments

Example: 

?embed[]=field1&embed[]=field2

description: Get a list of candidates running in the election, optionally with sentiments.

name: GetCandidates

title: Get a Candidate

Parameter.description:
Fields to embed on the response. Available fields: sentiments, candidates

Example: 

?embed[]=field1&embed[]=field2

name: GetCandidatesCandidateid

title: Get Media-Sentiments

Parameter.description:
Skip over a number of elements by specifying an offset value for the query.

Example: 

?offset=20

Limit the number of elements on the response.

Example: 

?limit=20

description: Get a breakdown of media sentiments for this candidate.
name: GetCandidatesCandidateidMediaSentiments

Parameter.description:
Skip over a number of elements by specifying an offset value for the query.

Example: 

?offset=20

Limit the number of elements on the response.

?limit=20

name: GetMediaMediaidSentiments

title: Get News

Parameter.description:
Fields to embed on the response. Available fields: mentions

Example: 

?embed[]=field1&embed[]=field2

Skip over a number of elements by specifying an offset value for the query.

Example: 

?offset=20

Limit the number of elements on the response.

Example: 

?limit=20

Filter articles based on id of media.

Example: 

?media_id[]=1&media_id[]=2

Filter articles based on id of mentioned candidates.

Example: 

?candidate_id[]=1&candidate_id[]=2

description: Get a list of news, optionally with mentioned candidates. Filterable by media and mentioned candidates.

examples.title: Success
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
[
  {
      "id": 1,
      "media_id": 3,
